entry.title: Sunday: Showers. High 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers near noon. A few showers beginning early this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 6. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers at times heavy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers at times heavy changing to freezing rain near midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Ice pellets mixed with snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning late in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
